```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
student_por = read.csv('student+performance/student-por.csv', sep = ';',  stringsAsFactors = FALSE)
student_math = read.csv('student+performance/student-mat.csv', sep = ';', stringsAsFactors = FALSE)
all_data = rbind(student_por, student_math)
```

```{r}
head(all_data)
write.csv(all_data, 'student+performance/merged_data.csv', row.names = FALSE)
```
